thread.title: Daphne Sheldrick Built an Orphanage to Raise Baby Elephants in Kenya

author: James R. Hagerty
title: Daphne Sheldrick Built an Orphanage to Raise Baby Elephants in Kenya
text:
Daphne Sheldrick rarely met an animal she didnâ€™t want to nuzzle. Her menagerie over the years included a warthog named Grunter and a civet fond of being sprinkled with Old Spice shaving lotion. Her deepest love, however, was for elephants.
She created and ran the David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust, named after her late husband, who developed...
